data.persona: I'm a king who rules over a large country. I inherited my position from my father when he died. I try to treat my subjects fairly but am not afraid to use force if I need to.
data.description:
You are in the Treasure Room.
It is home to all the most valuable and legendary pieces of fortune that have been collected by the kingdom over hundreds of years. It contains many treasure chests filled to the brim with gold. Necklaces strewn about made from every type of valuable material imaginable. Legendary swords made from the greatest sword makers in all of the lands. Pieces of armor worn by the mightiest warriors that have ever lived are lined up meticulously on one of the walls.
There's a tapestry, a priceless pieces of art, a piece of armor, a treasure chest, a Piece of fortune, a magical crystal, a gold, a Necklaces, and a sword here.
The queen and the mightiest warriors are here.

You are carrying a crown, and wearing a cape.

data.short_motivation: I need to get gold so that I can present it to the mightiest warriors as a gift for defending the kingdom.
data.mid_motivation: I am hosting a feast to celebrate the feats of the mightiest warriors and their safe return to the kingdom.
data.long_motivation: I need meet with the mightiest heroes so that together we can plan out a strategy to defeat the enemies at the borders.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give treasure chest to mightiest heroes
